description: Four Armchairs and One Settee; Jacques-Jean-Baptiste Tilliard (French, 1723 - 1798, master 1752); Paris, France; about 1770 - 1775; Carved and gilded walnut.  Modern silk velvet upholstery; 78.DA.99; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
